java/liquibase/change/CreateIndexChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.CreateIndexStatement;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00006 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00007 import liquibase.database.structure.Index;
00008 import liquibase.database.structure.Table;
00009 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00010 import liquibase.exception.InvalidChangeDefinitionException;
00011 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;
00012 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00013 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00014 
00015 import java.util.*;
00016 
00020 public class CreateIndexChange extends AbstractChange implements ChangeWithColumns {
00021 
00022     private String schemaName;
00023     private String tableName;
00024     private String indexName;
00025     private Boolean unique;
00026     private String tablespace;
00027     private List<ColumnConfig> columns;
00028 
00029 
00030     public CreateIndexChange() {
00031         super("createIndex", "Create Index");
00032         columns = new ArrayList<ColumnConfig>();
00033     }
00034 
00035     public String getIndexName() {
00036         return indexName;
00037     }
00038 
00039     public void setIndexName(String indexName) {
00040         this.indexName = indexName;
00041     }
00042 
00043     public String getSchemaName() {
00044         return schemaName;
00045     }
00046 
00047     public void setSchemaName(String schemaName) {
00048         this.schemaName = StringUtils.trimToNull(schemaName);
00049     }
00050 
00051     public String getTableName() {
00052         return tableName;
00053     }
00054 
00055     public void setTableName(String tableName) {
00056         this.tableName = tableName;
00057     }
00058 
00059     public List<ColumnConfig> getColumns() {
00060         return columns;
00061     }
00062 
00063     public void setColumns(List<ColumnConfig> columns) {
00064         this.columns = columns;
00065     }
00066 
00067     public void addColumn(ColumnConfig column) {
00068         columns.add(column);
00069     }
00070 
00071 
00072     public String getTablespace() {
00073         return tablespace;
00074     }
00075 
00076     public void setTablespace(String tablespace) {
00077         this.tablespace = tablespace;
00078     }
00079 
00080 
00081     public void validate(Database database) throws InvalidChangeDefinitionException {
00082         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(tableName) == null) {
00083             throw new InvalidChangeDefinitionException("tableName is required", this);
00084         }
00085         for (ColumnConfig column : getColumns()) {
00086             if (StringUtils.trimToNull(column.getName()) == null) {
00087                 throw new InvalidChangeDefinitionException("column name is required", this);
00088             }
00089         }
00090     }
00091 
00092     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00093         List<String> columns = new ArrayList<String>();
00094         for (ColumnConfig column : getColumns()) {
00095             columns.add(column.getName());
00096         }
00097 
00098         return new SqlStatement[]{
00099                 new CreateIndexStatement(getIndexName(), getSchemaName() == null ? database.getDefaultSchemaName() : getSchemaName(), getTableName(), this.isUnique(), columns.toArray(new String[getColumns().size()])).setTablespace(getTablespace())
00100         };
00101     }
00102 
00103     protected Change[] createInverses() {
00104         DropIndexChange inverse = new DropIndexChange();
00105         inverse.setSchemaName(getSchemaName());
00106         inverse.setTableName(getTableName());
00107         inverse.setIndexName(getIndexName());
00108 
00109         return new Change[]{
00110                 inverse
00111         };
00112     }
00113 
00114     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00115         return "Index " + getIndexName() + " created";
00116     }
00117 
00118     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00119         Element element = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement("createIndex");
00120         element.setAttribute("indexName", getIndexName());
00121         if (getSchemaName() != null) {
00122             element.setAttribute("schemaName", getSchemaName());
00123         }
00124 
00125         element.setAttribute("tableName", getTableName());
00126 
00127         if (unique != null) { 
00128             if (unique) {
00129                element.setAttribute("unique", "true");
00130             } else {
00131                 element.setAttribute("unique", "false");
00132             }
00133         }
00134         
00135         for (ColumnConfig column : getColumns()) {
00136             Element columnElement = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement("column");
00137             columnElement.setAttribute("name", column.getName());
00138             element.appendChild(columnElement);
00139         }
00140 
00141         return element;
00142     }
00143 
00144     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00145         Index index = new Index();
00146         index.setTable(new Table(tableName));
00147         index.setName(indexName);
00148         index.setUnique(unique);
00149 
00150         Table table = new Table(getTableName());
00151 
00152         return new HashSet<DatabaseObject>(Arrays.asList(index, table));
00153     }
00154 
00158     public void setUnique(Boolean isUnique) {
00159         this.unique = isUnique;
00160     }
00161 
00165     public Boolean isUnique() {
00166         return this.unique;
00167     }
00168 
00169 }
